Mr. Borisade said Water Parks management is doing everything to ensure a suc- cessful show. "So, we are abiding by all the terms of the contract," he said. To make the show real, Water Parks invited Raypower 100 FM as part promoter to transmit the show live for the benefit of Fela's fans.
